description.p1: We provide free seminar over video call. This free seminar is for anyone whether it is organization, group of developers(Fresher, experience or anyone) or students .

lines.line-2: Over video conference max join limit is 250 people, User must be gmail user.
lines.line-3: We verify provided below details in order to prevent misuse of information.

requestedAs.label: You are
requestedAs.developers: Group of developers (Fresher, Experienced or Students)

organizationDetail.title: Organization Detail
organizationDetail.note: We will verify entered detail by contacting contact information found in entered website.

preferredDates.title: Preferred dates
preferredDates.note: If preferred dates are not available, we will notify you with available dates.

acceptance.label: If provided email address is not registered, we will create account. Clicking this you also agree with our terms.

button.label: Request free seminar
button.note: We will send you, meeting link and covered topic for the seminar.

submitted.title: Submitted
submitted.line-1: Your request for free seminar has submitted, please wait while we review.
submitted.line-2: We have sent you email regarding same, please check and response if required.
